metadata.title: CVE-2017-18551 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/i2c/i2c-core-smbus.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.14.15. There is an out of bounds write in the functioni2c_smbus_xfer_emulated.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-150-generic - 4.4.0-150.176
